Installation¶

Required packages¶

pygtc is written in Python 2.7 and requires the following packages:

  • numpy >= 1.5
  • matplotlib >= 1.5
  • scipy (optional)

Downloading and installing¶

The latest stable version of pygtc is hosted at PyPi.

If you like pip, you can install with:

pip install pygtc

Or, alternatively, download and extract the tarball from the above link and then install from source with:

cd directory_you_unpacked_ptgtc_into
python setup.py install

Development¶

Development happens at github. You can clone the repo with:

git clone https://github.com/SebastianBocquet/pygtc

And you can install it in developer mode with pip:

pip install -e directory_where_you_cloned_pygtc

or from source:

cd directory_cloned_pygtc_into
python setup.py develop

If you like this project and want to contribute, send a message over at the github repo and you can be added as a collaborator!
